original_text: For with the judgment you pronounce you will be judged, and with the measure you use it will be measured to you.
korean_text: 너희가 비판하는 그 비판으로 너희가 비판을 받을 것이요 너희가 헤아리는 그 헤아림으로 너희가 헤아림을 받을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: For with the judgment you pronounce
and with the measure you use
it will be measured to you.
